author: aandvalenzuela
body:
Node is launched with `.cms-bot/lumi/connect.sh $OS cms-bot/lumi/jenkins_java.sh` with `OS` value being `el8` or `el9`.

Script `update_image.sh` runs on the lumi user node and updates the `.sif` images given a target OS and architecture.
title: Connect Jenkins agent to LUMI slots
